projectGridLines.title: Digital Marketing Strategy for Textile Products
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Develop and implement a comprehensive digital marketing strategy to enhance the

online presence of the company's textile products. This will include optimizing the company's

website, managing social media profiles, creating engaging content, and running digital advertising

campaigns.

Skill sets: Digital marketing, content creation, social media management, SEO, Google Ads, data

analytics.

Traits expectation:

Expected learning: Students will learn about digital marketing techniques, the importance of an

online presence for businesses, and how to measure and analyze the effectiveness of digital

campaigns.

projectGridLines.title: Supply Chain Management - Inventory Optimization
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Analyze the current supply chain and inventory management practices of the

company. Propose and implement strategies to optimize inventory levels, reduce holding costs, and

improve the overall efficiency of the supply chain.

Skill sets: Supply chain management, data analysis, logistics, inventory management, ERP systems.

Traits expectation: Problem-solving skills, analytical thinking, attention to detail, organizational

skills, and the ability to work under pressure

Expected learning: Students will gain insights into supply chain operations, inventory management

techniques, and the use of ERP systems in managing supply chains.

projectGridLines.title: Accounting - Financial Analysis and Reporting
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Conduct a detailed financial analysis of the company's textile products. Prepare

financial reports, analyze cost structures, and recommend strategies for improving profitability. This

project will also involve setting up a system for regular financial monitoring and reporting.

Skill sets: Financial analysis, accounting, cost management, financial reporting, Excel, accounting

software.

Traits expectation: Analytical thinking, attention to detail, integrity, strong numerical skills, and the

ability to work independently.

Expected learning: Students will learn about financial analysis techniques, the importance of

accurate financial reporting, and strategies for improving business profitability.

Specific courses required for project execution: Fundamentals of Finance and Accounting

projectGridLines.title: Market Research and Consumer Insights for Textile Products
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Conduct market research to understand consumer preferences, market trends, and

competitive landscape for textile products. Develop consumer personas and provide actionable

insights to guide the company's marketing strategy.

Skill Sets: Market research, data analysis, consumer behavior, survey design, qualitative and

quantitative research methods.

Expected Learning: Students will learn about market research methodologies, how to gather and

analyze consumer data, and how to translate research findings into marketing strategies.

Traits Expectation: Analytical thinking, curiosity, strong communication skills, attention to detail,

and the ability to work collaboratively.

projectGridLines.title: Sales Strategy Optimization for Textile Products
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Analyze and optimize the current sales strategies for the company's textile products.

This project will involve studying sales data, identifying trends, and developing new strategies to

improve sales performance. It will also include training the sales team on best practices and implementing a customer relationship management (CRM) system to enhance sales efficiency.

Skill Sets: Sales strategy, data analysis, CRM systems, customer relationship management, sales

training.

Expected Learning: Students will learn about effective sales strategies, the importance of data-

driven decision-making, and how to implement and utilize CRM systems to boost sales

performance.

Traits Expectation: Strong communication skills, analytical thinking, problem-solving skills,

customer-focused mindset, and ability to work under pressure.
